content.full_text: Check of Abraham Lincoln to Robert Irwin, 14 March 18571 SPRINGFIELD MARINE & FIRE INSURANCE CO. For Value Received, and charge to account of ToMss.[Messieurs]Page & Bacon2StLouis RICHARDS & SMITH, PR.[Printers]
